snippet: The Italian eyewear group Luxottica overhauled its top management structure after its chief executive, Andrea Guerra, left because of disagreements with its chairman, Leonardo Del Vecchio.
abstract: Luxottica overhauls its management structure in wake of departure of its chief executive Andrea Guerra, who left after 10 years in job due to disagreements with chairman, Leonardo Del Vecchio.
lead_paragraph: The Italian eyewear group Luxottica overhauled its top management structure after its chief executive, Andrea Guerra, left because of disagreements with its chairman, Leonardo Del Vecchio.

headline.main: A Management Shake-Up at Luxottica, Ray-Ban Maker
